summary.para: Groups the specified child process with the parent process. This method is no longer supported on Windows 10, version 1809, and later versions.

param.name: childProcessHandle
param.para: The child process to group with the parent process.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Registers the specified process as a child. This method is no longer supported on Windows 10, version 1809, and later versions.

param.name: processHandle
param.para: The process to be registered as a child.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Ungroups the specified child process from the parent process. This method is no longer supported on Windows 10, version 1809, and later versions.

param.name: childProcessHandle
param.para: The child process to ungroup from the parent.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods to manage dependencies in process suspension scenarios. This interface is no longer supported on Windows 10, version 1809, and later versions.
